item.title: Make a smarter Diffuser
item.description: Making a diffuser a little smarter Making nicer smells My dumb diffuser I bought this bargain diffuser second-hand from Ebay last year. You fill the container with water and add a few drops of an essential oil and it makes your room smell nice. Thereâ€™s a little ultrasonic emitter inside that turns the liquid into a cool mist that pours forth from the tip. It works well enough like this. You press a button and it starts. You press the same button two more times and it stops. There are some pretty lights too.
